sources.title: Africa Screams
sources.description: from IMDB.com: "Abbott & Costello search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of cannibals." Also stars Clyde Beatty and Shemp Howard. You can load the mpeg2 file into DVDAuthorGUI (a free program) and create a DVD to watch on your television.

sources.title: Africa Screams (1949)
sources.description: When bookseller Buzz cons Diana into thinking that his friend Stanley knows all there is to know about Africa, they are abducted and ordered to lead Diana and her henchmen to an African tribe in search of a fortune in jewels. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/africa-screams-1949/

sources.title: Africa Screams
sources.description: Title: Africa Screams Summary: Abbott & Costello search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of cannibals... Directed by: Charles Barton Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Clyde Beatty Production Company: Nassour Studios Inc. Release Date: 27 May 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When bookseller Buzz cons Diana into thinking fellow bookseller Stanley knows a great deal about Africa they are abducted and ordered to lead Diana and her henchmen to an African tribe. After encounters with lion tamers, giant apes and a wild river, Buzz returns to America. Stanley finds diamonds and buys the store they once worked for, hiring Buzz as its elevator operator.

sources.title: Africa Screams (1949) ABBOTT & COSTELLO
sources.description:
Stars: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello
Director: Charles Barton

Abbott & Costello search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of hungrier cannibals!

sources.title: Africa Screams ( 1949) 4 K Restoration Classic Trailer
Africa Screams 1949 [colorised, 4k, 60FPS]
sources.description: Africa Screams 1949 is a black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab

metadata.Plot: When bookseller Buzz cons Diana into thinking fellow bookseller Stanley knows a great deal about Africa they are abducted and ordered to lead Diana and her henchmen to an African tribe. After encounters with lion tamers, giant apes and a wild river, Buzz returns to America. Stanley finds diamonds and buys the store they once worked for, hiring Buzz as its elevator operator.
metadata.Writer: Earl Baldwin, Martin Ragaway, Leonard Stern
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Clyde Beatty
